document.full_text: hollywood comes to france wednesday for the premiere of woody allen's romantic comedy "midnight in paris," the opening film at this year's cannes film festival which critics expect to be the best in a long time.
document.title: cannes kicks off with woody allen comedy
lines_and_colors: hollywood comes to france wednesday for the premiere of woody allen's romantic comedy "midnight in paris," the opening film at this year's cannes film festival which critics expect to be the best in a long time.
